content: looking for a gender neutral baby blanket to gift to expecting parents look no further this crochet pattern for a gingham baby blanket will be the perfect gift for any parents who are keeping their baby s gender hush-hush this baby blanket was created to be gender neutral however you can use any colors you prefer i used red heart super saver brand - medium 4 weight light sage less than 1 full skein super saver darker green aran white 1 full skein super saver + minimal amounts of second skein frosty green 1 full skein super saver + ~1/3 skein lighter green finished blanket is approximately 37 by 33 with my gauge this pattern is set up to be 15 blocks wide and 13 blocks tall block = 10 st x 10 row you can alter this as you see fit to make a larger or smaller blanket i prefer to end each row and column on an odd number so that all corners end in white for example you will need to know how to chain single_crochet carry non-working yarn and slip_stitch you can find a free version of this pattern on my blog at theloopholefox com
